content: I'm glad you're interested in trying progressive muscle relaxation! It's a great technique for managing pain and anxiety. Since I've been dealing with a herniated disc, I've found it really helpful in reducing muscle tension and promoting relaxation. I've been doing it about 2-3 times a week, and it's made a big difference in how I feel. By the way, it's been 12 weeks since I came down with the flu, and it's been a long road to recovery. But I'm determined to get back on track and take care of my health.
